    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(int totalPlayer)
        This method is the Constructor method of the board. This method initializes the cards,players,all of the squares of the board.
        Parameters:
        totalPlayer -
        Requires:
        totalPlayer must be between 2-12.
        Modifies:
        totalPlayer,players,chanceDeck,communityDeck,squares
        Effects:
        Board is created and ready for the game.

    • Method Detail

      • initializePlayers

        public void initializePlayers(int totalPlayer)
        This method creates the player of the game with given values.
        Parameters:
        totalPlayer -
        Requires:
        totalPlayer must be between 2 and 12.
        Modifies:
        players arraylist is changed
        Effects:
        Players are created and listed in the players arraylist.

      • initializeCards

        public void initializeCards()
        This method creates the Card objects, chanceDeck and communityDeck. After creating the decks, it shuffles it so that cards are in random order.
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        This method modifies the chanceDeck and communityDeck
        Effects:
        chanceDeck and communityDeck are full of cards in random order.

      • peekChanceCard

        public CardChance peekChanceCard()
        This method returns the CardChance object at the top of the chanceDeck.
        Returns:
        It returns CardChance object
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        This method doesn't modify the chanceDeck object. It just returns the top of it.
        Effects:
        The card which is at the top of deck will be returned.

      • peekCommunityCard

        public CardCommunity peekCommunityCard()
        This method returns the CardCommunity object at the top of the communityDeck.
        Returns:
        It returns CardCommunity object
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        This method doesn't modify the communityDeck object. It just returns the top of it.
        Effects:
        The card which is at the top of deck will be returned.

      • pullPushChance

        public void pullPushChance()
        This method picks the card at the top of the deck and puts it to the bottom. After this method is called, the next card which will be picked will change.
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        It modifies the communityDeck.
        Effects:
        The card at the top of the deck is changed.

      • pullPushCommunity

        public void pullPushCommunity()
        This method picks the card at the top of the deck and puts it to the bottom. After this method is called, the next card which will be picked will change.
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        It modifies the communityDeck.
        Effects:
        The card at the top of the deck is changed.

      • getOtherProperties

        public int[] getOtherProperties(int color)
        This method takes a color code and gives the all properties with the given color.
        Parameters:
        color -
        Returns:
        Returns the array of integers with the id's of the properties.
        Requires:
        color must be between 0 and 19.
        Modifies:
        This method does not modifies anything.
        Effects:
        Properties in the same color group will be returned.

      • getSquareFromBoard

        public Square getSquareFromBoard(int id)
        This method takes the square id as a parameter and returns the square object to the user.
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        This method returns the Square object with the given id.
        Requires:
        id must be between 0 and 119
        Modifies:
        This method does not modifies anything.
        Effects:
        Square with the input id is returned to the user.

      • getSquareWithRowAndPosition

        public Square getSquareWithRowAndPosition(int row,
                                          int position)
        This method takes the coordinates of the square and returns the square object from Board.
        Parameters:
        row -
        position -
        Returns:
        This method returns the Square object with the given row and position.
        Requires:
        row must be between 0-2 and position must be limited depends on the row.
        Modifies:
        This method does not modifies anything.
        Effects:
        Square with the input row and position is returned to the user.

      • getResultArray

        public java.lang.String[] getResultArray()
        This method returns an empty String array.
        Returns:
        It returns a string array which all elements are zero.
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        This method does not modifies anything.
        Effects:
        String array with the length of 14 is given to the user. All indexes are initialized to 0.

      • nextSquare

        public Square nextSquare(int id)

        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Square object which is next to the given id of Square in the same row.
        Requires:
        id must be between 0 and 119
        Modifies:
        This method does not modifies anything.
        Effects:
        Square which is next to the given square id is given to the user.

      • getHalfPool

        public void getHalfPool(Player p)
        This method gives the half of the pool to the player.
        Parameters:
        p -
        Requires:
        Player p must be an active player.
        Modifies:
        pool and money of the player
        Effects:
        Half of the pool is added to the player and pool is decreased to its half.

      • getAllPool

        public void getAllPool(Player p)
        This method gives the all of the pool to the player.
        Parameters:
        p -
        Requires:
        Player p must be an active player.
        Modifies:
        pool and money of the player
        Effects:
        All of the pool is added to the player and pool is decreased to 0.
